projects.title: Online Examination System using
projects.description: The "Online Examination System" is a robust web application developed using the .Net Framework, designed to streamline the process of conducting exams online. This system provides an efficient and user-friendly platform for educational institutions, training centers, and organizations to create, administer, and evaluate exams seamlessly.

projects.title: Voice-Assistant News
projects.description: Build a Voice-Assistant News webapp using React.js and MongoDB involves several steps. Below is an outline of the process along with a high-level overview of the architecture and the key components you'll need.
